name: Nimble Navigation
description:
Created by Declan Whitford Jones and Seong Joon (Joel) Yoo

This is a simple game with only 5 rules:

  1. Click to shoot
  2. Dodge all objects (except for atmospheric stars)
  3. Player follows mouse
  4. Go through gates (between two red squares)
  5. Shoot brown asteroids

Made with love (and Java 1.8)
